name: Maryfrancis CASSELL, Appellee, v. LANCASTER MENNONITE CONFERENCE, Appellant

judges: Before: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
parties: Maryfrancis CASSELL, Appellee, v. LANCASTER MENNONITE CONFERENCE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 14th day of March, 2005, this appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Vivian Bella Narehood, Esq., Jon Dwight Yoder, Esq., Lancaster, for Lancaster Mennonite Conference.
Mary A. Wells, pro hoc vice, James Michael Beck, Esq., L. Michael Brooks, Jr., Esq., pro hac vice, for amicus curiae Product Liability Advisory Council, Inc.
David Samuel Dessen Esq., for Mary-frances Cassell.
casebody.head_matter:
869 A.2d 974
Maryfrancis CASSELL, Appellee, v. LANCASTER MENNONITE CONFERENCE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 1, 2004.
Decided March 14, 2005.
Vivian Bella Narehood, Esq., Jon Dwight Yoder, Esq., Lancaster, for Lancaster Mennonite Conference.
Mary A. Wells, pro hoc vice, James Michael Beck, Esq., L. Michael Brooks, Jr., Esq., pro hac vice, for amicus curiae Product Liability Advisory Council, Inc.
David Samuel Dessen Esq., for Mary-frances Cassell.
Before: CAPPY, C.J., and CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
